welcome_message_body: Welcome to Lee's Summit, a charming city known for its historic downtown, beautiful parks, and friendly community. We hope you enjoy your time here and take the opportunity to explore all that our city has to offer!

restaurants.name: Third Street Social
restaurants.description: Third Street Social is a american restaurant located in Lees Summit.
restaurants.address: 123 SE 3rd St (btwn SE Douglas & Green St), Lees Summit, MO 64063

restaurants.name: Llywelyn's Pub

restaurants.address: 301 SE Douglas St (3rd), Lees Summit, MO 64063

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Johnson Executive Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Johnson Executive Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport for all passengers.
